wikipedia_page.main: Adriano Rigoglioso (born 29 May 1979) is an English former footballer who played as a midfielder.

response: On 8 May 2012, Mutch was announced as manager of Northwich Victoria. He left the club having resigned, along with player-coach Adriano Rigoglioso on 3 November, with the club eighth in the table, and 21 points behind leaders Coalville Town On 1 October 2013 Mutch was appointed as manager of Evo Stik Premier Club Stafford Rangers after a successful interim period, but left by mutual consent on 2 January after a run of very poor results.
